alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 10:55PM CDT until May 06 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PORTAGE AND SOUTHEASTERN MARATHON COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bevent, or 13 miles northeast of Stevens Point, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Galloway, Shantytown, Dewey Marsh Wildlife Area, Holt and Rocky Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to urban flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
